title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 1 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ananta Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhīma Cekitāna Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Draupadī Droṇa Duryodhana Dāsa Ganga Gita Govinda Hanumān Janārdana Karṇa Krishna Krsna Kuntī Kurukṣetra KurukṣetraTEXT Kṛpa Madhusūdana Mantra Nakula Prabhupāda Pārtha Rishi Sahadeva Sañjaya Subhadrā Sughoṣa Swami Sātyaki Uttamaujā Varna Vasudeva Vikarṇa Vishnu Yudhāmanyu Yuyudhāna dasa Śaibya

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 2 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Chandra Dasa Devi Dhanañjaya Dharma Droṇa Dāsa Ganga Gita Govinda Krishna Krsna Kuntī Madhusūdana Mantra Prabhupāda Pārtha Rishi Sañjaya Swami Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa kṣatriya kṣatriyas yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 3 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhāratas Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Janārdana Keśava Krishna Krsna Kuntī Mantra Prabhupāda Pārtha Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa karma yajña yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 4 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhārata Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vishnu Vivasvān dasa yoga yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 5 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Kuntī Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa karma yoga yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 6 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Kuntī Madhusūdana Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi SixDhyāna Swami Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa kuśa samādhi yoga yogī yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 7 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhāratas Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Kuntī Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 8 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhāratas Brahman Brahmā Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Kuntī Madhusūdana Mantra Prabhupāda Pārtha Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vedāntists Vishnu adhibhūta adhiyajña adhyātma dasa karma kāra yoga yogī yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 9 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Chandra Dasa Devi Dhanañjaya Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Indra Krishna Krsna Kuntī Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Swami Sāma Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa vaiśyas

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 10 Sanskrit Terms
text: Agni Airāvata Ananta Arjuna Aryamā Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhṛgu Brahmā Bṛhaspati Bṛhat Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Garuḍa Gita Himālayas Indra Janārdana Krishna Krsna Kārttikeya Mantra Marīci Nāgas Nārada Prabhupāda Prahlāda Rishi Rāma Swami Sāma Varna Varuṇa Vasudeva Vishnu Vyāsa Vāsudeva Vāsuki Yakṣas dasa sāma Ādityas Śiva

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 11 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhāratas Brahmā Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Droṇa Dāsa Ganga Gita Janārdana Karṇa Krishna Krsna Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Sañjaya Swami Sādhyas Varna Vasudeva Vishnu Viśvedevas Yakṣas Yādava dasa kumāras Ādityas Śiva

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 12 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vishnu bhakti dasa yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 13 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhāratas Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Kuntī Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vedānta Vishnu dasa prakṛti puruṣa sūtra

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 14 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhāratas Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Kuntī Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 15 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vedānta Vishnu Yoga dasa

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 16 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Kuntī Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 17 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhāratas Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Mantra Prabhupāda Rishi Swami Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa prasādam

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 18 Sanskrit Terms
text: Arjuna Ashram Balarāma Bhagavad Bhakti Bhāratas Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Gita Krishna Krsna Kuntī Mantra Prabhupāda Pārtha Rishi Sañjaya Swami Varna Vasudeva Vedānta Vishnu Vyāsa dasa kṣatriyas sannyāsa tyāga vaiśyas yoga
